attributes.action: stop the red list: let people isolate at home
attributes.additional_details: Students, parents, families, breadwinners and lots more are stuck in red list countries, because they cannot afford to pay hotel fee, others have anxiety and need support. The government should support us in these times and relieve us of the burden of hotel quarantining. Please reduce the hotel fee and consider the wellbeing of those who you are telling to isolate. People have had to go abroad for inevitable situations (e.g.bereavemnt) and should be supported and relieved of the hotel quarantine,
attributes.background: stop the red list: let people isolate at home
